FINAL VERDICT: 3 Rounds, 12 Agents

Bot Rebuild Evaluation | Feb 14, 2026
Round 1
BUILD
4 agents: Product, Systems, EP/VV, DSG
Round 2
DON'T BUILD YET
5 agents: iOS, Devil, Unique, Workflow, Coordinator
Round 3
BUILD SOMETHING TINY
3 agents: Proactive, iOS Corrected, Minimum Viable

THE ANSWER

Don't build a bot. Build a GitHub Action.

The only genuinely unique value is proactive messaging (bot messages you first). A GitHub Action does this for $0/month, ~100 lines, 30 minutes to set up, zero maintenance.

Everything else — voice capture, shaping, vision, GitHub PRs, memory — Claude Code on iOS already handles.

CLAUDE CODE iOS CAN DO (don't build)

  • Voice input (iOS keyboard dictation)
  • Read ALL repo files (CLAUDE.md, project.json, HUD)
  • Write/edit files in cloud VM
  • Create branches + PRs
  • Run bash commands (Python, Node, Go, etc.)
  • Async tasks (close app, come back later)
  • Multiple parallel tasks
  • Respects CLAUDE.md
  • Teleport sessions to desktop (/teleport)

CLAUDE CODE iOS CANNOT DO (real gaps)

  • Send YOU a message first (proactive)
  • Vision/images in Code mode (confirmed bug)
  • Custom MCP servers (Notion, etc.)
  • Access local files (only GitHub repos)
  • JSONL logging to your files
  • Native voice mode in Code tab
  • Offline operation
  • Still research preview (buggy UI)
How the Question Narrowed Across 3 Rounds ▶
Round 1: "Should we build a Gemini bot?" 4 agents said YES. Full architecture: Gemini + SQLite + systemd + 10 slices. Everyone agreed. Too easy. Round 2: "Wait — what does Claude iOS already do?" 5 agents challenged. Devil's advocate: ship-or-park violated, 0 calls made. Found: Claude iOS covers 70%. Only 3 unique bot capabilities. Consensus broke. "Don't build yet." User correction: "Claude Code iOS CAN write to GitHub." Dropped "GitHub write" from unique capabilities. Now only 1 truly unique capability: proactive messaging. Round 3: "Is proactive messaging worth a whole bot?" 3 agents researched alternatives. Found: GitHub Actions does proactive messaging for $0. No bot needed. iOS Shortcuts = broken (phone must be unlocked). ChatGPT Tasks / Gemini Actions = can't read your project data. GitHub Action wins. 100 lines. 30 minutes. Done.
What Proactive Messages Look Like ▶
7:30 AM — MORNING BRIEFING FRIDAY FEB 14 ACTIVE: - FORJE/Puma: Trial Tuesday. Compress lessons TODAY. - GRM: Meeting Thursday. Interview Qs ready. - GAS Pipeline: /outreach not started (3 days stale) STALE CONTACTS: - Mairo Abugo: 6 days (send generator msg) - Fisayo: 8 days (referral follow-up) WAITING ON: - PRL trial confirmation (Timmy) 6:00 PM — STALE CONTACT ALERT > 5 DAYS: - Mairo Abugo (generator deal) — 6 days - Fisayo — 8 days, referral follow-up SUNDAY 10 AM — RAISED SEED TRIAGE > 7 DAYS (keep or kill?): - "podcast guest strategy" — 12 days - "Craft integration" — 9 days

All of these are just file reading + date math + formatted text. No AI needed. A bash script does it.

IMPLEMENTATION: 30 Minutes, 100 Lines, $0/month

Your repo already auto-syncs to GitHub every 10 min. Data is always fresh. GitHub Action reads it on schedule. Files to create: .github/workflows/morning-pulse.yml (~30 lines) scripts/morning-pulse.js (~70 lines) How it works: 1. GitHub Action cron fires at 6:30 UTC (7:30 WAT) 2. Checkout repo (auto-synced, data is fresh) 3. Node script reads v4-data.js (eval + JSON.stringify) 4. Reads contact-cache.json for stale dates 5. Reads session map for orphaned/parked streams 6. Formats as plain text Telegram message 7. curl → Telegram Bot API → arrives on your phone Secrets needed (one-time setup): TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN — from @BotFather (already have one) TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID — your Telegram user ID Cost: $0. Public repo = unlimited Actions minutes. Maintenance: Near zero. Only update if v4-data.js structure changes. Reliability: GitHub cron may delay 5-30 min. Fine for morning briefing. v4-data.js parsing note: It's JS, not JSON (single quotes, const declaration). Solution: node -e "eval(require('fs').readFileSync('v4-data.js','utf8')); console.log(JSON.stringify(hud))" Then parse the JSON normally.
Your Tool Stack (Final) ▶
PHONE (away from laptop): Claude Code iOS — Voice capture, shaping, PRs, async tasks Claude iOS Chat — Vision/photos, strategic thinking, research Telegram — Receives proactive morning pulse from GitHub Action HBS Helper Bot — Client bot (Rochelle's group, already live) LAPTOP: Claude Code CLI — Full power building, session packets, HUD updates Terminal + Browser — Split screen, HTML outputs, HUDs INFRASTRUCTURE: GitHub Actions — Morning pulse, stale contact alerts ($0) VPS ($4/mo) — HBS Helper Bot, future client bots Auto-sync — Every 10 min, keeps GitHub fresh NOT NEEDED: Custom Telegram bot for personal capture — Claude iOS does this Gemini 2.5 Flash API — Not needed if not building bot SQLite conversation memory — Claude iOS has memory systemd service for personal bot — GitHub Actions replaces VPS for personal bot — VPS stays for CLIENT bots only
What the Devil's Advocate Got Right ▶
  • Ship-or-Park violated 3 weeks ago — CORRECT. Don't repeat the pattern.
  • 4,300-line archived bot proves bloat — CORRECT. The GitHub Action is 100 lines.
  • HBS Helper Bot (89 lines) shipped, personal bot didn't — CORRECT. Ship small.
  • Claude iOS does the core job — MOSTLY CORRECT. Code tab + Chat tab covers 90%.
  • "Just set a phone alarm" — PARTIALLY CORRECT. Alarm works but loses project context.
  • 0 pipeline calls = should be selling — MISAPPLIED. Bot is a personal assistant, not a sales tool.
What Happens to the Current VPS Bot? ▶
Current state: aloe-bot-v3 running on VPS with Claude Code CLI - OAuth expires every 6 hours - Has V3 (auto-issue) + V4 (issue commands) - Running in tmux (fragile) Recommendation: Let it expire. Don't re-auth. - The V3/V4 features (GitHub issues from phone) can be done via Claude Code iOS - The OAuth problem is SOLVED by not needing the bot - Keep the VPS for the HBS Helper Bot (Rochelle's group) - Archive aloe-bot-v3.py for reference GitHub issue cleanup: - Close #17 (OAuth refresh) — no longer relevant - Close #9 (Deepgram V2) — Gemini not needed for personal bot - Keep other issues that apply to client bots
